dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: Oh thank god you swap by. I need help, my name is Scook-

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: This guy is an actual idiot, I came with him to complete the parrot dream of standing on a pirate's shoulder ...

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: But this guy's a fake. His name is Carl, his hook and pegleg are from the dollar store and he speaks in pirate buzzwords.

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: He's essentially nothing more than a cosplayer at sea.

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: Listen, I did some snooping in the Captain's quarters and saw his journal. He spent his life savings on this boat and won't leave until he finds treasure.

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: We're too far from the shore for me to fly home so I need this shop to leave. If you can bring us treasure I'll pay you in fish, lots of them!

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: You can drop off treasure by swimming and jumping over the barrel behind the ship!

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: Go find Wally the whale, he was here earlier and swap down to get away from this guy. He'll help you navigate the underwater caves.

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: Do you have treasure? Go drop it off in the barrel out back. If not, go do something useful and find some please!

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: You've gotta be more careful, you nearly died!

dialogue.name: Carl
dialogue.text: YEEE BE STANDIN' ON THE BRINK O' DAVEY JONES' LOCKER, YA SCALLYWAG!!! SHIVERRRR ME TIMBERRRRS!!!

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: I've got to get out of here...

dialogue.name: Carl
dialogue.text: AVAST YE! A PILE OF COFFERS IN ME BARREL, ME HEARTIES.

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: I think Carl is satisfied now, we can finally go home. Thanks for all your help!

dialogue.name: Carl
dialogue.text: PULL IT IN, STOW IT IN THE ORLOP!

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: I wonder when he'll notice he has no crew to take his orders. Let's hope he still remembers how to sail back.
